[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-gas-meter/src/meter.rs] [Global: CPU exhaustion] Can attackers craft transactions with operations that consume excessive CPU time relative to gas charged, degrading validator performance? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-gas-meter/src/meter.rs] [Global: Timestamp dependencies] Do any gas calculations depend on wall-clock time or other non-deterministic sources that could diverge across validators? (Critical)
